## Current teaching

### GEOG0030: Geocomputation

I contribute to [GEOG0030](https://osd.ucl.ac.uk/liveletters/GEOG0030), UCL's undergraduate module on geocomputation and spatial analysis using R.

- [GEOG0030 Coursebook](https://jo-wilkin.github.io/GEOG0030-Coursebook/)

### R GIS Tutorials

A collection of R tutorials covering GIS topics including geocoding, network analysis, and greenspace accessibility.

- [R GIS Tutorials](https://jo-wilkin.github.io/R-GIS-Tutorials/)

### GIS & AI Manual

A practical guide to using AI tools (including LLMs) for GIS and spatial analysis workflows.

- [GIS AI Manual](https://jo-wilkin.github.io/gis_ai_manual/)
